mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.fangyuan_id as fangyuanId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.fangyuan_liuyan_text as fangyuanLiuyanText ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,fangyuan.fangyuan_name as fangyuanName ,fangyuan.fangyuan_types as fangyuanTypes ,fangyuan.zushou_types as zushouTypes ,fangyuan.fangyuan_photo as fangyuanPhoto ,fangyuan.fangyuan_chufadi as fangyuanChufadi ,fangyuan.fangyuan_mianji as fangyuanMianji ,fangyuan.fangdong_name as fangdongName ,fangyuan.fangdong_phone as fangdongPhone ,fangyuan.fangyuan_jiage as fangyuanJiage ,fangyuan.fangyuan_content as fangyuanContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM fangyuan_liuyan a left JOIN fangyuan fangyuan ON a.fangyuan_id = fangyuan.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.fangyuan_id = #{params.fangyuanId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.fangyuan_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangyuanLiuyanText},'%')
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.fangyuan_id IS NOT NULL
and fangyuan.fangyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangyuanName},'%')
and fangyuan.fangyuan_types = #{params.fangyuanTypes}
and fangyuan.zushou_types = #{params.zushouTypes}
and fangyuan.fangyuan_chufadi like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangyuanChufadi},'%')
and fangyuan.fangyuan_mianji like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangyuanMianji},'%')
and fangyuan.fangdong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangdongName},'%')
and fangyuan.fangdong_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangdongPhone},'%')
and fangyuan.fangyuan_jiage like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangyuanJiage},'%')
and fangyuan.fangyuan_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.fangyuanContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
